entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 20 in the evening then light after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 25 March 2023
